an5.256:4.1: “Mendicants, without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
an5.256:4.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
an5.256:4.4: Without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
an5.256:5.1: But after giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.
an5.256:5.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
an5.256:5.4: After giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.”
